game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient scroll from the ruins of Eldarath.
game.description: Ancient lore speaks of a powerful scroll hidden deep within the lost city of Eldarath. The scroll is said to hold the secrets of the long-lost magic of the Eldarians. Brave adventurers, seek out the ruins and claim the scroll for the people of Eridoria!
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces, 500 experience points, and a magical amulet granting resistance to fire.
game.quest-giver: Eryndor Thorne, Sage of the Ancients

task.objective: Reach the entrance of the lost city.
task.description: Brave the treacherous mountain paths and avoid deadly traps to reach the grand entrance of Eldarath.
task.location: The Mountains of Mor'Dhul, near the ancient stone marker "Eldarath's Gate"

task.objective: Navigate the ancient ruins and avoid deadly traps.
task.description: Carefully navigate the crumbling structures, avoiding deadly traps set by the Eldarians to protect their treasures.
task.location: The Lost City of Eldarath, central district

task.objective: Retrieve the ancient scroll from the treasure chamber.
task.description: Use all your wits and skills to overcome the final challenge: claiming the ancient scroll from the treasure chamber of Eldarath.
task.location: The Treasure Chamber, Lost City of Eldarath
